resources:
Ebola RISK Settings Information
Continue to the app Calculate risk Important information
"Ebola RISK is a proof-of-concept app designed to illustrate how prognosis prediction " "models could inform clinical care. It shows World Health Organization\'s treatment " "guidelines for Ebola patients, based on predicted mortality risk."
"Because it is a research prototype, this app should NOT be used to make treatment " "decisions on actual patients."
"For questions or comments contact the author (Andres Colubri) at:" ScrollingActivity "Material is the metaphor.\n\n"
